problem.name: Binomial Coefficients Part 5262
description: Write a function that, given two integers N and K, returns N choose K, or the Binomial Coefficient of N and K, modulo 998244353 (a large prime).
N and K can be up to 10,000 in this version of the problem
problem.html:
Problem name: Binomial Coefficients Part 5262

Description:

Write a function that, given two integers N and K, returns N choose K, or the Binomial Coefficient of N and K, modulo 998244353 (a large prime).,N and K can be up to 10,000 in this version of the problem

Function signature: binomial2(n, k)

Test Cases:

  • 5 3 -> 10
  • 9 4 -> 126
  • 10 3 -> 120
  • 10 6 -> 210
  • 12 9 -> 220
  • 12 4 -> 495
  • 403 152 -> 275391141
  • 9065 4356 -> 887300965
  • 7693 2343 -> 505771294
  • 2834 1433 -> 402685368
  • 9879 5888 -> 81411887
  • 6 4 -> 15
